vectorFactory Class Reference

Reads events from a specified file or calls event generator to create a 3 particle event and packages a raw event into a particle struct array. More...

struct  ParticleParameters
 Event particle container. More...

Detailed Description

Reads events from a specified file or calls event generator to create a 3 particle event and packages a raw event into a particle struct array.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

vectorFactory::vectorFactory (  ) 

Empty constructor for quick use of struct population functions that do not require event generation.

vectorFactory::vectorFactory ( double  nu  ) 

Constructor used for generating N events.

Parameters:
nu 2m_e/M which the square is used as the bottom boundary for generating x,y values with the Monte Carlo rejection method

vectorFactory::vectorFactory ( double  nu,
const char *  CMfilepath 
)

Constructor used for generating N events and creating a output .hepevt file which contains the CM events.

Parameters:
nu 2m_e/M which the square is used as the bottom boundary for generating x,y values with the Monte Carlo rejection method
CMfilepath the filepath designated for eventGenerator to output CM events into

Member Function Documentation

void vectorFactory::copyObject ( ParticleParameters *  evtP_a,
ParticleParameters *  evtP_b 
)

Method that makes a deep copy of one struct array onto another struct array.

Parameters:
evtP_a the particle struct array to be copied
evtP_b the particle struct array to become a copy of the first argument

void vectorFactory::createEvent ( double  M,
double  m_e,
double  initial_p 
)

A function that calls the local eventGenerator to create a unique 3 particle event and calls the struct population functions.

Parameters:
M The mass of the pion.
m_e The mass of the electron/positron.
initial_p The initial momentum of the system in the Lab frame.

void vectorFactory::makeCalculations ( ParticleParameters &  particle  ) 

Takes a reference address to a particle struct with a predefined particle ID and sets the struct members at the address (pt, theta, x_m).

Parameters:
particle a particle struct passed by reference.

void vectorFactory::printVectors (  )  [inline]

Debugging method that prints the contents of the local particle struct array.

(deprecated with N events) A function that reads a specified .hepevt file and calls the struct population functions.

Parameters:
path The path the the specified .hepevt file.

void vectorFactory::setPID ( ParticleParameters *  evtP  ) 

Given a particle struct array, sets all the particle IDs at the appropriate indices.

Parameters:
evtP event particles, a pointer to a particle struct array.

void vectorFactory::setTLVector ( int  pID,
double  px,
double  py,
double  pz,
double  m 
)

Given the vector information and a particle ID, this helper method will populate the 4 vector for a struct whose index is associated with the particle ID.

Parameters:
pID The particle ID which determines the index of where the 4 vector will be set.
px The x-component of momentum.
py The y-component of momentum.
pz The z-component of momentum.
m The mass of the particle.

Member Data Documentation

ParticleParameters* vectorFactory::arrPtr

Local copy of particle struct array, indices match the standard particle numbers i.e. 1-positron, 2-electron, 3-photon.

eventGenerator* vectorFactory::gen

Local instance of eventGenerator to get 4 vectors
